Public NotInheritable Class Cursor Implements IDisposable, ISerializable
public ref class Cursor sealed : IDisposable, System::Runtime::Serialization::ISerializable
type Cursor = class interface IDisposable interface ISerializable

summary.span: 表示用來繪製滑鼠指標的影像。

span.span: Represents the image used to paint the mouse pointer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料指標是在螢幕上的位置會受到指標裝置，例如滑鼠、 畫筆或軌跡球的小型圖片。A cursor is a small picture whose location on the screen is controlled by a pointing device, such as a mouse, pen, or trackball. 當使用者將指標裝置時，作業系統會隨之移動游標。When the user moves the pointing device, the operating system moves the cursor accordingly. 不同的資料指標的圖形用來通知使用者滑鼠會有哪些作業。Different cursor shapes are used to inform the user what operation the mouse will have. 例如，當編輯，或選取文字，通常會顯示資料指標。For example, when editing or selecting text, a cursor is typically displayed. 等候資料指標常用來通知的處理序目前執行的使用者。A wait cursor is commonly used to inform the user that a process is currently running. 您可能必須等候使用者的處理序的範例會開啟檔案，儲存檔案，或填滿控制項這類，或大量資料。Examples of processes you might have the user wait for are opening a file, saving a file, or filling a control such as a , or with a large amount of data. 所有控制項衍生自類別具有屬性。All controls that derive from the class have a property. 若要變更控制項的界限內時，滑鼠指標所顯示的游標，指派至控制項的屬性。To change the cursor displayed by the mouse pointer when it is within the bounds of the control, assign a to the property of the control. 或者，將指派應用程式層級顯示資料指標至屬性。Alternatively, you can display cursors at the application level by assigning a to the property. 例如，如果您的應用程式的目的是要編輯的文字檔案，您可能會設定屬性設檔案載入或儲存以防止任何滑鼠事件處理時，透過應用程式顯示等待游標。For example, if the purpose of your application is to edit a text file, you might set the property to to display a wait cursor over the application while the file loads or saves to prevent any mouse events from being processed. 此程序完成時，請將屬性設來顯示適當的資料指標，透過每個控制項類型的應用程式。When the process is complete, set the property to for the application to display the appropriate cursor over each control type. > [!NOTE] > 如果您呼叫重設之前屬性將會回到游標，應用程式會繼續接聽滑鼠事件，且將會恢復顯示適當應用程式中每個控制項。If you call before resetting the property back to the cursor, the application will resume listening for mouse events and will resume displaying the appropriate for each control in the application. 您可以從數個來源，例如將現有的控制代碼建立資料指標的物件，一種標準檔案、 資源或資料流。Cursor objects can be created from several sources, such as the handle of an existing , a standard file, a resource, or a data stream. > [!NOTE] > 類別不支援動畫效果的資料指標 （.ani 檔案） 或使用黑白色彩的資料指標。The class does not support animated cursors (.ani files) or cursors with colors other than black and white. 如果您使用資料指標的影像太小，您可以使用方法，以強制影像來填滿資料指標的範圍。If the image you are using as a cursor is too small, you can use the method to force the image to fill the bounds of the cursor. 您可以藉由呼叫暫時隱藏游標方法，並將它還原藉由呼叫方法。You can temporarily hide the cursor by calling the method, and restore it by calling the method. 從.NET Framework 4.5.2 開始會根據系統 DPI 設定時的 app.config 檔案包含下列項目調整大小：Starting with the .NET Framework 4.5.2, the will be resized based on the system DPI setting when the app.config file contains the following entry: ``` ``` ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示一個表單，示範如何使用自訂游標。The following code example displays a form that demonstrates using a custom cursor. 自訂內嵌在應用程式的資源檔。The custom is embedded in the application's resource file. 這個範例需要名為游標檔案中包含的資料指標`MyCursor.cur`。The example requires a cursor contained in a cursor file named `MyCursor.cur`. 若要編譯此範例中使用命令列，包括下列旗標： `/res:MyCursor.Cur, CustomCursor.MyCursor.Cur`To compile this example using the command line, include the following flag: `/res:MyCursor.Cur, CustomCursor.MyCursor.Cur` [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Cursor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursor/CS/customcursor.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Cursor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursor/VB/customcursor.vb#1)] 下列程式碼範例會顯示客戶資訊控制項。The following code example displays customer information in a control. 根樹狀節點顯示客戶名稱，而子樹狀節點顯示指派給每位客戶的訂單數目。The root tree nodes display customer names, and the child tree nodes display the order numbers assigned to each customer. 在此範例中，15 筆訂單會顯示 1,000 個客戶。In this example, 1,000 customers are displayed with 15 orders each. 重新繪製的使用隱藏並方法，並等候會顯示時建立和繪製物件。The repainting of the is suppressed by using the and methods, and a wait is displayed while the creates and paints the objects. 此範例中，您需要名為的游標檔`MyWait.cur`應用程式目錄中。This example requires that you have a cursor file named `MyWait.cur` in the application directory. 它也需要`Customer`物件，可保存集合`Order`物件，以及您已建立的執行個體控制。It also requires a `Customer` object that can hold a collection of `Order` objects, and that you have created an instance of a control on a . [!code-cpp[TreeView#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeView/CPP/treeview.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[TreeView#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeView/CS/treeview.cs#1)] [!code-vb[TreeView#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeView/VB/treeview.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您完成使用後，您必須釋放資料指標控制代碼。You must free the cursor handle when you are done with it. 如需有關如何處置資源的詳細資訊，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源總](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。For more information about disposing of resources, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立資料指標資料指標的，變更其位置和裁剪方框。The following code example creates a cursor from the cursor's , changes its position and clipping rectangle. 結果是游標會移至左的 50 個像素從它所在的程式碼執行時。The result is the cursor will move up and to the left 50 pixels from where it is when the code is executed. 此外，資料指標的裁剪方框變更表單的邊界 （預設值是使用者的整個螢幕）。Additionally, the cursor's clipping rectangle is changed to the bounds of the form (by default it is the user's whole screen). 此範例中，您需要和按下時會呼叫此程式碼。This example requires that you have a and a to call this code when it is clicked. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members/CPP/cursorstuff.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members/CS/cursorstuff.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members/VB/cursorstuff.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所指定的資料流`stream`必須包含游標 (.cur) 檔。The data stream specified by `stream` must contain a cursor (.cur) file. > [!NOTE] > 動畫的資料指標 （.ani 檔案） 不會受到類別。Animated cursors (.ani files) are not supported by the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會載入資料指標所建立方法。The following code example loads a cursor from a created by the method of an . 呼叫此方法時，顯示給使用者和時間。When the method is called, an is displayed to the user and when a. 選取 CUR 檔案並關閉對話方塊，將檔案開啟時，傳回用來建立。CUR file is selected and the dialog closed, the file is opened and the returned is used to create a . remarks.format: ## Remarks `fileName`參數必須參考標準游標 (.cur) 檔。The `fileName` parameter must reference a standard cursor (.cur) file. > [!NOTE] > 動畫的資料指標 （.ani 檔案） 不會受到類別。Animated cursors (.ani files) are not supported by the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示客戶資訊控制項。The following code example displays customer information in a control. 根樹狀節點顯示客戶名稱，而子樹狀節點顯示指派給每位客戶的訂單數目。The root tree nodes display customer names, and the child tree nodes display the order numbers assigned to each customer. 在此範例中，15 筆訂單會顯示 1,000 個客戶。In this example, 1,000 customers are displayed with 15 orders each. 重新繪製的使用隱藏並方法，並等候會顯示時建立和繪製物件。The repainting of the is suppressed by using the and methods, and a wait is displayed while the creates and paints the objects. 此範例中，您需要`Customer`物件，可保存集合`Order`物件。This example requires that you have a `Customer` object that can hold a collection of `Order` objects. 它也需要您已建立的執行個體控制。It also requires that you have created an instance of a control on a . [!code-cpp[TreeView#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeView/CPP/treeview.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[TreeView#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeView/CS/treeview.cs#1)] [!code-vb[TreeView#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeView/VB/treeview.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以下是如何為您的應用程式內的資源內嵌在資料指標的範例。The following is an example of how to embed a cursor as a resource within your application. 若要內嵌資源，請參考後面接著一個逗號，則其完整的組件路徑的資源名稱。To embed the resource, reference the resource name followed by a comma, then its full assembly path. 請參閱 < 範例 > 一節以了解如何從內嵌資源載入的資料指標。See the Example section to learn how to load the cursor from the embedded resource. ``` Using the C# compiler: csc /resource:"MyWaitCursor.cur","MyCursors.MyWaitCursor.cur" MyCursor.cs Using the Visual Basic compiler: vbc /resource:"MyWaitCursor.cur","MyCursors.MyWaitCursor.cur" MyCursor.vb ``` > [!NOTE] > 資源參考編譯時，以及在程式碼中參考它時是區分大小寫的 C# 和 Visual Basic 編譯器。The resource reference when compiling as well as when referencing it in code, is case sensitive for both the C# and Visual Basic compilers. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示一個表單，示範如何藉由使用自訂游標建構函式。The following code example displays a form that demonstrates using a custom cursor by using the constructor. 自訂內嵌在應用程式的資源檔。The custom is embedded in the application's resource file. 這個範例需要您有包含在名為的游標檔游標`MyCursor.cur`。The example requires that you have a cursor contained in a cursor file named `MyCursor.cur`. 若要編譯此範例中使用命令列，包括下列旗標： `/res:MyCursor.Cur, CustomCursor.MyCursor.Cur`To compile this example using the command line, include the following flag: `/res:MyCursor.Cur, CustomCursor.MyCursor.Cur` [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Cursor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursor/CS/customcursor.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Cursor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursor/VB/customcursor.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定表示游標裁剪方框的範圍。

span.span: Gets or sets the bounds that represent the clipping rectangle for the cursor.

value.span: ，代表在螢幕座標中 的裁剪方框。

span.span: The that represents the clipping rectangle for the , in screen coordinates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 裁剪的資料指標可以只在其裁剪矩形內移動。A clipped cursor is allowed to move only within its clipping rectangle. 一般而言，系統會允許這，只有當目前捕捉滑鼠。Generally, the system allows this only if the mouse is currently captured. 如果資料指標目前並未裁剪，產生的矩形會包含整個螢幕的尺寸。If the cursor is not currently clipped, the resulting rectangle contains the dimensions of the entire screen. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立資料指標資料指標的，變更其位置和裁剪方框。The following code example creates a cursor from the cursor's , changes its position and clipping rectangle. 結果是游標會移至左的 50 個像素從它所在的程式碼執行時。The result is the cursor will move up and to the left 50 pixels from where it is when the code is executed. 此外，資料指標的裁剪方框變更表單的邊界 （預設值是使用者的整個螢幕）。Additionally, the cursor's clipping rectangle is changed to the bounds of the form (by default it is the user's whole screen). 此範例中，您需要和按下時會呼叫此程式碼。This example requires that you have a and a to call this code when it is clicked. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members/CPP/cursorstuff.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members/CS/cursorstuff.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members/VB/cursorstuff.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 而呼叫這個方法建立的控制代碼必須處置的因為它將不會處置的記憶體回收行程完成與它時。The handle created as a result of calling this method must be disposed of when you are done with it because it will not be disposed of by the garbage collector.

A that represents the mouse cursor.

value.span: 如果滑鼠游標不可見，則預設值為 。

span.span: The default is if the mouse cursor is not visible.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定屬性變更目前顯示的游標。Setting the property changes the cursor currently displayed. 在應用程式可能會或可能不會繼續接聽滑鼠事件。The application may or may not continue to listen for mouse events. 若要發出信號，應用程式不應回應滑鼠事件在長時間執行作業期間，使用屬性。To signal that the application should not respond to mouse events during a long-running operation, use the property. 在大部分情況下，不過，最好使用背景執行緒管理長時間執行的作業，並保留您的使用者介面，使用者可存取。In most cases, however, it's better to use a background thread to manage a long-running operation, and leave your user interface accessible to the user. 如需有關如何輕鬆地實作背景工作的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information on easily implementing a background task, see .

permission.span: 用於設定此屬性的安全子視窗。

span.span: for safe subwindows to set this property.

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的所有資源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用完畢時，請呼叫 。Call when you are finished using the . `Dispose` 方法會將 保留在無法使用的狀態。The `Dispose` method leaves the in an unusable state. 之後呼叫，您必須釋放所有的參考讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體，所佔用。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 清除 Unmanaged 資源向上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)並[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 在您釋放最後一個 參考之前，請務必呼叫 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否則，它所使用的資源將不會釋放直到記憶體回收行程釋放它為止。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector frees it. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例在其一般的大小和自動縮放模式，其大小的兩倍的表單上繪製指定的資料指標。The following code example draws the specified cursor on the form in its normal size, and in stretched mode, twice its size. 這個範例需要和時要傳遞至方法呼叫它。This example requires a and a to pass into the method when it is called. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members/CPP/cursorstuff.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members/CS/cursorstuff.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members/VB/cursorstuff.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public void Draw (System.Drawing.Graphics g, System.Drawing.Rectangle targetRect);

Public Sub Draw (g As Graphics, targetRect As Rectangle)
public: void Draw(System::Drawing::Graphics ^ g, System::Drawing::Rectangle targetRect);

param.name: g
param.span: 要繪製 的 表面。

span.span: The surface on which to draw the .
The that represents the bounds of the .

summary.span: 在指定的表層和指定的範圍內繪製游標。

span.span: Draws the cursor on the specified surface, within the specified bounds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 繪圖命令來源上所代表的圖形表層`g`參數，但不包含資訊來呈現指定的映像，因此它會傳遞至呼叫。The drawing command originates on the graphics surface represented by the `g` parameter, but a does not contain information about how to render a given image, so it passes the call to the . 方法將影像裁剪成指定的維度，並可讓您指定其內描繪。The method crops the image to the given dimensions and allows you to specify a within which to draw the . 如果您想要的圖形表層上繪製游標，通常會使用這個方法。This method is typically used if you want to draw the cursor on a Graphics surface. 比方說，您可能會有一個對話方塊，可讓使用者選取 從資料指標控制項或一群控制項。For example, you might have a dialog that allows the user to select cursors from a control, or a group of controls. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例在其一般的大小和自動縮放模式，其大小的兩倍的表單上繪製指定的資料指標。The following code example draws the specified cursor on the form in its normal size, and in stretched mode, twice its size. 此範例中，您需要和物件傳入方法呼叫時。This example requires that you have a and a object to pass into the method when it is called. span.span: Draws the cursor in a stretched format on the specified surface, within the specified bounds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 繪圖命令來源上所代表的圖形表層`g`參數，但物件不包含如何呈現指定的映像，因此它會傳遞至呼叫的相關資訊物件。The drawing command originates on the graphics surface represented by the `g` parameter, but a object does not contain information about how to render a given image, so it passes the call to the object. 方法會自動縮放以填滿指定的映像時繪製資料指標。The method stretches the image to fill the specified when the cursor is drawn. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例在其一般的大小和自動縮放模式，其大小的兩倍的表單上繪製指定的資料指標。The following code example draws the specified cursor on the form in its normal size, and in stretched mode, twice its size. 此範例中，您需要和物件傳入方法呼叫時。This example requires that you have a and a object to pass into the method when it is called. remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立資料指標資料指標的，變更其位置和裁剪方框。The following code example creates a cursor from the cursor's , changes its position and clipping rectangle. 結果是游標會移至左的 50 個像素從它所在的程式碼執行時。The result is the cursor will move up and to the left 50 pixels from where it is when the code is executed. 此外，資料指標的裁剪方框變更表單的邊界 （預設值是使用者的整個螢幕）。Additionally, the cursor's clipping rectangle is changed to the bounds of the form (by default it is the user's whole screen). 這個範例需要和按下時會呼叫此程式碼。This example requires a and a to call this code when it is clicked. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這不是一份控制代碼;不要處置它。This is not a copy of the handle; do not dispose of it. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立資料指標資料指標的，變更其位置和裁剪方框。The following code example creates a cursor from the cursor's , changes its position and clipping rectangle. 結果是游標會移至左的 50 個像素從它所在的程式碼執行時。The result is the cursor will move up and to the left 50 pixels from where it is when the code is executed. 此外，資料指標的裁剪方框變更表單的邊界 （預設值是使用者的整個螢幕）。Additionally, the cursor's clipping rectangle is changed to the bounds of the form (by default it is the user's whole screen). 這個範例需要和按下時會呼叫此程式碼。This example requires a and a to call this code when it is clicked. span.span: Hides the cursor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和必須平衡的方法呼叫。The and method calls must be balanced. 針對每次呼叫必須有對應呼叫的方法方法。For every call to the method there must be a corresponding call to the method. ## Examples 當滑鼠指標進入此按鈕的工作區時，下列程式碼範例會隱藏游標。The following code example hides the cursor when the mouse pointer enters the button's client area. 同樣地，當滑鼠指標離開按鈕的工作區時，游標會再次顯示。Likewise, when the mouse pointer leaves the button's client area, the cursor is shown again. 這個範例需要具有名為`myButton`。This example requires a with a named `myButton`. [!code-cpp[CursorFromResource#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CursorFromResource/CPP/mycursor.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[CursorFromResource#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CursorFromResource/CS/mycursor.cs#3)] [!code-vb[CursorFromResource#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CursorFromResource/VB/mycursor.vb#3)]
